import React, { Component } from 'react' import { BrowserRouter as Router, Route } from 'react-router-dom' import Header from './Header' import Home from './Home' import Footer from './Footer' import Sobre from './Sobre' import Contato from './Contato' import Campanhas from './Campanhas' import base from './base' class App extends Component { componentDidMount(){ base.syncState('contador',{ context: this, state: 'contador', asArray: false }) } render() { return (

Contador: {this.state.contador}

 ) } } export default App
